ingredients.item: 400g can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
200g can tuna steak in spring water, drained
4 artichoke hearts from a 390g can, quartered

instructions.step: Mix together the beans, tuna, and artichokes in a large bowl.
Whisk the pesto, oil, vinegar and 2 tbsp water together and heat in a microwave for 30 seconds then toss into the tuna mixture. Toss with the salad and serve.
